data.title: The Spohrs Are Multiplying and Sharing Tips on Surviving Toddlers
data.meta_description: Mike and Heather Spohr from the popular blog The Spohrs Are Multiplying talk with me about their new book The Toddler Survival Guide: Complete Protection from the Whiny Unfed! Mike is a Buzzfeed Parents Editor and Heather runs their wildly popular blog. These funny parents are sharing their tips on surviving the toddler years, navigating the digital media space, and building a brand while parenting young children. Don't forget to subscribe to Motherhood in Hollywood on iTunes. Follow me on Twitter @HeatherBrooker Instagram at www.instagram.com/MotherhoodinHollywood Facebook at www.facebook.com/motherhoodinhollywood And keep up with my Hollywood happenings at www.motherhoodinhollywood.com
data.text:
Mike and Heather Spohr from the popular blog The Spohrs Are Multiplying talk with me about their new book The Toddler Survival Guide: Complete Protection from the Whiny Unfed! Mike is a Buzzfeed Parents Editor and Heather runs their wildly popular blog. These funny parents are sharing their tips on surviving the toddler years, navigating the digital media space, and building a brand while parenting young children.

Don't forget to subscribe to Motherhood in Hollywood on iTunes.

Follow me on Twitter @HeatherBrooker

Instagram at www.instagram.com/MotherhoodinHollywood

Facebook at www.facebook.com/motherhoodinhollywood
